item.description:
Enneagram, Love, Romance and Relationships

Learn about which types are more likely to spark up together and what to enjoy and avoid in each type in regard to love and romance. Learn the romance strategies of each type and what types are turned on by and turned off particular behaviors! Learn communication skills relevant for particular combinations.

Traditional cost $40
Sliding scale to $20

7-10pm

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is a relationship coach, therapist and phone coach for individuals, couples and families. He's an expert in the Enneagram and Personality Types, and is the author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. He has taught thousands of workshops in the last 30 years in the Enneagram, Myers-Briggs, Relationship Dynamics, Communication Skills, Gender Dynamics, Self Esteem and Spiritual Development.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
Sign up for his weekly email newsletter by emailing or signing up on his website.
item.name: Enneagram, Love, Romance and Relationships
